languages.text: Во время редких встреч Абеляр Версериан и Соломон Антар проводили время за игрой в регицид, которой научил проктора сенешаль. Их партии, кропотливо записанные адъютантом Абеляра, вошли в сборник лучших партий Простора и впоследствии цитировались дворянами во время игр. Первый офицер Версериан ушел из жизни, так и не завершив последнюю игру в долгой веренице ничьих. На его похоронах Соломон Антар присутствовал при полной форме и регалиях и возложил на могилу фигурку из регицида.

Abelard Werserian and Solomorne Anthar spent most of their infrequent meetings playing regicide, to which the Seneschal had introduced the Proctor. Meticulously recorded by Abelard's adjutant, their games soon found their way into collections of the best ones ever played in the Expanse, and were later referenced by many a noble regicide aficionado. When First Officer Werserian passed away before he could finish the last match in a long series of draws, Solomorne attended his funeral in full dress and regalia, and placed a regicide piece on his grave.
languages.original_text: Во время редких встреч Абеляр Версериан и Соломон Антар проводили время за игрой в регицид, которой научил проктора сенешаль. На его похоронах Соломон Антар присутствовал при полной форме и регалиях и возложил на могилу фигурку из регицида.

traits.locale_text: The infrequent meetings between Abelard Wesserian and Solomorne Anthar were spent over games of regicide, which the Senechal had taught the proctor. Meticulously recorded by Abelard's adjutant, their games entered collections of the best ones ever played in the Expanse, and were later referenced by noble regicide aficionados. First Officer Wesserian passed away before he could finish the last game in a long series of draws. Solomorne Anthar attended his funeral in full dress and regalia, and placed a regicide piece on his grave.

Solomorne Anthar attended his funeral in full dress and regalia, and placed a regicide piece on his grave.

When First Officer Werserian passed away before he could finish the last match in a long series of draws, Solomorne attended his funeral in full dress and regalia, and placed a regicide piece on his grave.

languages.text: Abelard Werserian und Solomorne Anthar spielten bei ihren gelegentlichen Treffen meist Königsmord, das der Truchsess dem Proktor beigebracht hatte. Abelards Adjutant schrieb die Spiele penibel mit, und sie fanden bald ihren Weg in Sammlungen der besten Begegnungen, die je in der Ausdehnung gespielt worden waren. Später galten sie bei vielen adligen Königsmord-Begeisterten als Referenz. Als Erster Offizier Werserian verstarb, bevor er das letzte Spiel in einer langen Reihe von Unentschieden beenden konnte, nahm Solomorne in Galauniform und Ornat an seiner Bestattung teil und legte ihm eine Königsmord-Figur aufs Grab.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian and Solomorne Anthar spent most of their infrequent meetings playing regicide, to which the Seneschal had introduced the Proctor. Als Erster Offizier Werserian verstarb, bevor er das letzte Spiel in einer langen Reihe von Unentschieden beenden konnte, nahm Solomorne in Galauniform und Ornat an seiner Bestattung teil und legte ihm eine Königsmord-Figur aufs Grab.

languages.text: Les rares fois où Abélard Werserian et Solomorne Anthar se retrouvaient, ils jouaient au régicide, auquel le sénéchal avait initié le proctor. Leurs parties, méticuleusement archivées par l'adjudant d'Abélard, se retrouvèrent rapidement dans les recueils des meilleures parties jamais jouées dans les Étendues, et devinrent même des références pour bien des nobles appréciant ce jeu. Lorsque le second Werserian mourut, il laissa en suspens la dernière partie d'une longue série de matchs nuls. Solomorne assista à ses funérailles en tenue officielle et déposa sur la tombe de son adversaire une pièce de régicide.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian and Solomorne Anthar spent most of their infrequent meetings playing regicide, to which the Seneschal had introduced the Proctor. Meticulously recorded by Abelard's adjutant, their games soon found their way into collections of the best ones ever played in the Expanse, and were later referenced by many a noble regicide aficionado. When First Officer Werserian passed away before he could finish the last match in a long series of draws, Solomorne attended his funeral in full dress and regalia, and placed a regicide piece on his grave.

Solomorne assista à ses funérailles en tenue officielle et déposa sur la tombe de son adversaire une pièce de régicide.

languages.text: 阿贝拉德·韦尔森将弑君棋这种游戏推荐给了索罗蒙·安萨，两人难得见面的时候，绝大部分时间都在下弑君棋。阿贝拉德的副官精心记录了两人的对弈记录，而这些记录很快就被收入了科罗努斯扩区水平最高的棋谱之中，被后世许多爱好弑君棋的贵族反复学习。两人之间的对决常常以平分秋色告终，而阿贝拉德还未能打破这漫长的平局便溘然长逝。索罗蒙穿着正装参加了阿贝拉德的葬礼，在他的坟前摆了一枚弑君棋的棋子。
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian and Solomorne Anthar spent most of their infrequent meetings playing regicide, to which the Seneschal had introduced the Proctor. Meticulously recorded by Abelard's adjutant, their games soon found their way into collections of the best ones ever played in the Expanse, and were later referenced by many a noble regicide aficionado. When First Officer Werserian passed away before he could finish the last match in a long series of draws, Solomorne attended his funeral in full dress and regalia, and placed a regicide piece on his grave.

阿贝拉德·韦尔森将弑君棋这种游戏推荐给了索罗蒙·安萨，两人难得见面的时候，绝大部分时间都在下弑君棋。阿贝拉德的副官精心记录了两人的对弈记录，而这些记录很快就被收入了科罗努斯扩区水平最高的棋谱之中，被后世许多爱好弑君棋的贵族反复学习。两人之间的对决常常以平分秋色告终，而阿贝拉德还未能打破这漫长的平局便溘然长逝。索罗蒙穿着正装参加了阿贝拉德的葬礼，在他的坟前摆了一枚弑君棋的棋子。

languages.text: Abelard Werserian y Solomorne Anthar pasaron la mayor parte de sus escasas reuniones jugando a regicidio, después de que el Senescal enseñara a jugar al Procurador. Sus partidas, registradas en detalle por el ayudante de Abelard, pronto se unieron a las colecciones de las mejores de la Extensión, y muchos nobles aficionados al juego hacían referencia a ellas años después. Cuando el primer oficial Werserian falleció antes de terminar la última partida de una larga serie de empates, Solomorne asistió a su funeral con el traje militar ceremonial y colocó una pieza sobre su tumba.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian and Solomorne Anthar spent most of their infrequent meetings playing regicide, to which the Seneschal had introduced the Proctor. Meticulously recorded by Abelard's adjutant, their games soon found their way into collections of the best ones ever played in the Expanse, and were later referenced by many a noble regicide aficionado. When First Officer Werserian passed away before he could finish the last match in a long series of draws, Solomorne attended his funeral in full dress and regalia, and placed a regicide piece on his grave.

Sus partidas, registradas en detalle por el ayudante de Abelard, pronto se unieron a las colecciones de las mejores de la Extensión, y muchos nobles aficionados al juego hacían referencia a ellas años después. Cuando el primer oficial Werserian falleció antes de terminar la última partida de una larga serie de empates, Solomorne asistió a su funeral con el traje militar ceremonial y colocó una pieza sobre su tumba.

languages.text: アベラルド・ウェルザリアンとソロモーン・アンサールは、めったにない再会のたびにレジサイドに興じていた。これは家令長が代理人に紹介したものだった。アベラルドの副官によって綿密に記録された彼らの対局は、やがてコロヌス・エクスパンスでこれまでに行われた最高の対局集に収められ、多くの貴族のレジサイド愛好家に引用されるようになった。第一士官ウェルザリアンは長い間引き分けが続いていた試合の最後の対局を終える前に亡くなったが、ソロモーンは正装と儀礼服をまとって葬儀に参列し、彼の墓にレジサイドの駒を置いた。
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian and Solomorne Anthar spent most of their infrequent meetings playing regicide, to which the Seneschal had introduced the Proctor. Meticulously recorded by Abelard's adjutant, their games soon found their way into collections of the best ones ever played in the Expanse, and were later referenced by many a noble regicide aficionado. When First Officer Werserian passed away before he could finish the last match in a long series of draws, Solomorne attended his funeral in full dress and regalia, and placed a regicide piece on his grave.

traits.locale_text: アベラルド・ウェルザリアンとソロモーン・アンサールは、めったにない再会のたびにレジサイドに興じていた。これは家令長が代理人に紹介したものだった。アベラルドの副官によって綿密に記録された彼らの対局は、やがてコロヌス・エクスパンスでこれまでに行われた最高の対局集に収められ、多くの貴族のレジサイド愛好家に引用されるようになった。第一士官ウェルザリアンは長い間引き分けが続いていた試合の最後の対局を終える前に亡くなったが、ソロモーンは正装と儀礼服をまとって葬儀に参列し、彼の墓にレジサイドの駒を置いた。

languages.text: Abelard Werserian ve Solomorne Anthar, seyrek buluşmalarının çoğunu Seneşal'ın Üsteğmen'e öğrettiği bir oyun olan kral katili oynayarak geçirdi. Abelard'ın emir subayının ihtiyatla kaydettiği müsabakalar, çok geçmeden Enginlik'te oynanmış en iyi oyunlar arasındaki yerini aldı ve ilerleyen zamanlarda kral katilini tutkuyla oynayan pek çok soylu tarafından örnek gösterildi. Solomorne, uzun bir beraberlik serisinin ardından son maçı tamamlayamadan hayata veda eden İkinci Kaptan Werserian'ın cenazesine resmî kıyafetiyle katıldı ve mezarına bir kral katili taşı bıraktı.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian and Solomorne Anthar spent most of their infrequent meetings playing regicide, to which the Seneschal had introduced the Proctor. Meticulously recorded by Abelard's adjutant, their games soon found their way into collections of the best ones ever played in the Expanse, and were later referenced by many a noble regicide aficionado. When First Officer Werserian passed away before he could finish the last match in a long series of draws, Solomorne attended his funeral in full dress and regalia, and placed a regicide piece on his grave.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian ve Solomorne Anthar, seyrek buluşmalarının çoğunu Seneşal'ın Üsteğmen'e öğrettiği bir oyun olan kral katili oynayarak geçirdi. Abelard'ın emir subayının ihtiyatla kaydettiği müsabakalar, çok geçmeden Enginlik'te oynanmış en iyi oyunlar arasındaki yerini aldı ve ilerleyen zamanlarda kral katilini tutkuyla oynayan pek çok soylu tarafından örnek gösterildi. Birinci Solomorne, uzun bir beraberlik serisinin ardından son maçı tamamlayamadan hayata veda eden Subay Werserian'ın cenazesine resmî kıyafetiyle katıldı ve mezarına bir kral katili taşı bıraktı.
